name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the Side Menu in WhatsApp Web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the side menu in WhatsApp Web to get more space for your chats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your WhatsApp Web experience with this extension! Say goodbye to clutter and hello to a cleaner, more spacious chat interface. This extension allows you to effortlessly hide the side menu in WhatsApp Web, giving you extra room to focus on your conversations. With a simple click on the extension icon, you can toggle the visibility of the side menu, instantly expanding the space dedicated to your chats. Whether you're managing work conversations, catching up with friends, or sharing media, this extension empowers you to make the most of your screen real estate.
